name: KAVOUT
description:
Try to escape the cave while dealing with the changing controls !

The game's controls are, well, out of control. The key binding changes every 15 seconds. Will you be able to collect all the diamonds and escape the cave ?

The filling bar gives you an indication of when the key binding will change.

Use the arrows to move and jump.

The graphics come from Szadi83's Crystal World Platformer Pack. 

The music is Wolfgang's 8bit Cave Loop.

The sounds come from Little Robot Sound Factory's 8bit Sound Effects Library.
